Graduating my Web Design Students

Jul 19, 2015 â€¢ Jamie Pilgrim

When I saw that I was teaching a web design course I was stoked! I thought for sure that it would be a breeze since design and front end development come easy to me, but it ended up being much harder than I thought.

Doing More Than 'Making Things Pretty'

During these two weeks my students learned html, css, jquery and design theories. The last four days spent implementing what they learned into a final project.
